about_the_game:
VAMP - Video AMP

VAMP is a playful experience to dive into a lot of videos with interactive tiling.

Tiling works instantly and effortlessly, click left to tile, right to un-tile.

Play random moments from videos from active folders picked at top.

Hop between videos via your cursor with instant audio transitions.

Keep unlimited tabs with instant switching, at 8 KB per tab.

Custom antialiased vector font for arbitrary scalable UI for all monitor sizes.

Menus sliding out from four corners for a comfy multi-monitor experience.

Every single aspect distilled to simplicity.

Want to play even more videos?

Find out how many videos your computer can play simultaneously, it's more than you'd think.

Get more CPU cores, faster RAM and SSD, see how far you can push the limit.

Alternatively, use lighter videos, the details of a 1080p video won't be visible in a tiny area.

What's next?

Many fun mechanics while preserving this minimal design.

Further optimizations so you can play more videos on the same hardware.

Dark mode to watch lectures with light backgrounds without burning your eyes.

Background music/video playback with frame-exact looping.

Tags to organize your archive and playlists beyond folders.

Smooth audio normalization to auto adjust different volume levels in videos.

Photo slideshows with zoom/cutout regions.

Update about release

Thank you for your patience, working out the remaining stuff and small bugs now.

VAMP will be released in February 2025! (two weeks)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD - 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA/AMD/Intel with Vulkan support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 8-16 cores - scales to any
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA/AMD/Intel with Vulkan support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Dive into your video archive with instant tiling via simple mouse controls. Find out how many videos your machine can play simultaneously.
